info.description: A simple static site generator powered by Node.js, Webpack, and Browsersync

link.text: Click here to read the documentation.

features.list: Keep things DRY: Build pages with reusable ejs components.
Separation of concerns: Use json files to store page data and inject into your ejs components.
Use familiar languages and linters: ES6+ JavaScript, Sass, eslint, stylelint
Develop faster: Bowman's 'smart watch' integration with Browsersync allows for quick and efficient hot-reloading.
Be production-ready: Bowman's customized webpack configurations and markup generator optimizes assets and outputs HTML.
